title: Chalav Udvash - Health Food Store
description: Aims to combine caring and health with good taste. Every item in the store is certified kosher. Large selection of gluten-free products. Sugar-free items including Chalav Udvash's own brand of granola. Free nutritional advice and recipes. Send an e-mail to receive their free monthly e-newsletter to shulamit59@gmail.com. Fresh organic produce every Tuesday afternoon.
